text: Christian August Christensen (August 6, 1876 - December 5, 1956) was a Danish track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. He was a member of Københavns Idræts Forening and served as the club's president from 1903-1905 and from 1916-1918. He took fifth place in the single-round final of the 1500 metres. His time is unknown. Christensen also competed in the 800 metres. He placed fifth in his first-round (semifinals) heat and did not advance to the final. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006.
